name: Jungle of Bones
description:
Welcome to the Jungle of Bones

Archaeologist Rusty Bones, aka bones is trekking toward a far away land, a jungle where all the inhbitants are strangely skinless.

Hit space to jump and a and d to move left and right, you have three lives (lose all three and you'll be the next pile of bones) 

Have fun mates!

Quick notes, if you cannot jump,  backtrack to the block you jump before and try again. Also if you notice that your lives aren't regenerated after trying again simply refresh the website to fix the problem
